title.rendered:
Nobu and SODIC Announce Further Development with a Hotel and Restaurant in East Cairo


USA – English





MEXICO – Spanish




India – English

content.rendered:
The Third Nobu Hotel and Nobu Restaurant with Egypt’s Leading Luxury Developer 

NEW YORK, April 24, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Nobu, the renowned luxury lifestyle brand known for its iconic 41 hotels, 77 restaurants, and 12 residences, proudly announces the signing of Nobu Hotel and Restaurant East Cairo, in a continuing collaboration with Egypt’s leading real estate developer, SODIC. The signing, which took place at Nobu Fifty Seven in New York, marks Nobu and SODIC’s third venture in Egypt, following the unveiling of Nobu Hotel, Restaurant, and Residences in both West Cairo and North Coast Egypt last summer.







Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/nobu-and-sodic-announce-further-development-with-a-hotel-and-restaurant-in-east-cairo-302125554.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
